bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.blast.io

Class TxtExportSROutputOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.blast.io.TxtExportSROutputOptions

  • public class TxtExportSROutputOptions
extends Object
    This class defines the options that can be used to modify the rendering of SROutput used within the TxtExportSROutput export system.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Constructor Detail

      • TxtExportSROutputOptions

        public TxtExportSROutputOptions()
        Constructor. By default we export hit table, sequence alignments, program description and query description. You can use methods is this class to tune what you want to export, then use that object to configure TxtExportSROutput framework.

      • TxtExportSROutputOptions

        public TxtExportSROutputOptions(boolean exportTable,
                        boolean exportAlignments)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        exportTable - true or false
        exportAlignments - true or false
